alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hughes; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:39PM MDT until June 29 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... Eastern Lyman County in central South Dakota... Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 638 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Medicine Butte, or 9 miles south of Fort Thompson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelby, Crow Creek Housing, Etbauer Hill and Gann Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
